alert.note: Alert for Chase; Deuel; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 8:27PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong gusty winds from showers will impact portions of Perkins, southern Keith, Chase, southwestern Lincoln, southeastern Deuel and western Hayes Counties through 900 PM CDT/800 PM MDT/... At 826 PM CDT/726 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Big Springs to 16 miles north of Wray. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and areas of blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Grant, Wauneta, Wallace, Madrid, Venango, Elsie, Lamar, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Champion, Crete, Chase, Grainton, Center Dam Campground, Brandon, Wild Horse Spring, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area, Area A Campground and Church Grove Campground. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 81. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 105 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chase; Deuel; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins
